tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to incorrect execution-assigned permissions when creating Aspects with the default execution order. An attacker can manipulate a roleâ€™s permission boundaries by assigning `DEFAULT` permissions to a custom Aspect, which may be overridden by a built-in CDK method using `MUTATING` permissions. This can result in custom Aspects having fewer permissions than intended. In environments with overly permissive policies, however, this misconfiguration could inadvertently grant higher-than-expected permissions.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `aws-cdk-lib` library to the patch version.
